summary: An email from 'SP' to an unspecified recipient(s) regarding scheduling a call to discuss an issue that arose while reviewing physical evidence from the Epstein file on the previous Friday. The sender proposes several time slots for the call.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: The email's subject line indicates the call is 're Maxwell', suggesting Ghislaine Maxwell is the topic of the discussion related to the Epstein file evidence.

connections.description: SP is reviewing physical evidence from the Epstein file and needs to discuss an issue related to Maxwell.

events.title: Review of Epstein File Evidence
events.description: SP was reviewing physical evidence from the Epstein file, during which an issue related to Maxwell came up.

events.title: Scheduling of Call re Maxwell
events.description: An email is sent to schedule a call to discuss the issue found during the evidence review.

keyFacts: An active review of physical evidence from the Epstein file was ongoing as of April 2021.
The review uncovered an issue specifically related to Ghislaine Maxwell that required discussion.
The correspondence shows post-conviction investigative activity regarding Maxwell in 2021.
